reviews.title: QA support that reduced risk and improved release stability.
reviews.profile_image_alt: Elaine Correia, International Business Development at NTGS
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text:
We engaged Q-Pros to strengthen quality control during a significant enhancement phase of our SaaS platform. Their involvement provided an objective review of our application at a time when internal teams were focused heavily on feature delivery.
Rather than limiting testing to predefined cases, they explored system behavior across real-world scenarios and stressed key components to evaluate performance consistency. They identified logic inconsistencies and integration gaps that could have impacted user trust if released unnoticed. Their feedback was prioritized clearly, allowing our team to resolve issues efficiently without disrupting sprint cycles.
One of the most valuable aspects of working with Q-Pros was their ownership mindset. They tracked progress closely, validated fixes, and ensured nothing critical remained open before release. As a result, post-launch incidents were significantly reduced, and overall system performance was more predictable.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their ownership mindset and focus on preventing real production risks.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: Some early documentation reviews required extra clarification, but it improved final accuracy.

labeled_fields.Project title: Quality Assurance for SaaS Platform Enhancement
labeled_fields.Brief description of your project: Q-Pros supported QA during a SaaS platform enhancement, focusing on integration validation, performance stability, and risk reduction prior to release.

reviews.title: Pre-launch QA support that improved stability and launch confidence.
reviews.profile_image_alt: Lauren Wekwert, Marketing Director at P.A. Commercial
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text:
The team reviewed key user journeys, validated integrations, and performed regression and load testing to ensure the platform could handle expected traffic. They identified edge-case issues and workflow gaps that might have affected user experience if left unresolved. Their reports were structured, practical, and easy for our developers to act on.
What stood out most was their follow-through. They didn’t just submit findings; they revalidated fixes and confirmed improvements before closing tasks. This approach helped us move into launch with greater stability and confidence. Their involvement reduced production risks and strengthened the overall reliability of our release.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their thorough validation process and consistent follow-up on issue resolution.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: Early planning required additional clarification sessions, but it improved final accuracy.

reviews.title: Outstanding Local SEO & Google Business Profile Growth
reviews.profile_image_alt: Jeetendra Sharma, Owner at Muzaffarpur Honda
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text:
We partnered with Growthwale for our digital marketing and local SEO requirements, and the experience has been excellent from the beginning.
Their team understands the local market very well and helped us improve our Google Business Profile visibility, customer engagement, and overall online presence. Within a short period, we started noticing better profile interactions, more calls, and improved rankings in our area.
What we appreciated most was their clear communication, transparent strategy, and commitment to delivering measurable results rather than making unrealistic promises. They are proactive, responsive, and focused on long-term growth.
If you are looking for a reliable digital marketing partner who genuinely works for your business growth, we highly recommend Growthwale.
— Team Muzaffarpur Honda

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: What we liked most about Growthwale was their clarity and results-focused approach. They did not make unrealistic promises but instead explained a clear strategy and executed it step by step. Their understanding of local SEO, especially Google Business Profile optimization, made a noticeable difference in our visibility and customer inquiries. We also appreciated their transparency, regular communication, and commitment to long-term growth rather than short-term tactics.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: At the beginning, we would have appreciated slightly more frequent reporting updates to better track weekly progress. However, once the reporting structure was streamlined and expectations were aligned, the communication became clear and consistent. Overall, the experience has been positive and results-driven.

labeled_fields.Brief description of your project:
Muzaffarpur Honda partnered with Growthwale to strengthen our digital presence and improve our visibility in local search results. The primary objective was to optimize our Google Business Profile, increase customer inquiries, and enhance our online reputation in the Muzaffarpur market.
Growthwale conducted a complete audit of our profile, optimized business information, improved keyword targeting, enhanced service descriptions, and implemented a structured posting strategy. They also guided us on review management, customer engagement, and profile consistency across platforms.
As a result of their strategic approach, we experienced improved search visibility, increased profile interactions, and a noticeable growth in customer calls and inquiries.
The project focused on sustainable local growth, brand credibility, and measurable business impact rather than short-term results.

reviews.title: A reliable business partner who considers himself or herself a member of our team.
reviews.profile_image_alt: Sophia Zadachina, Customer Success Manager at EvaCodes
reviews.posting_preference: Only display my name with the review
reviews.review_text:
We invited Komenda on board to assist us in a number of blockchain projects that we required assistance with the front-end-facing part, such as marketing websites, investor landing pages, and front-end. Our group was working on smart contracts and blockchain logic, and Komanda was working on the web layer.
They fitted in our work routine fast and operated under our brand without resistance. It was easy to communicate, the deadlines were met and the quality remained the same in all projects.
Their independence was the best thing about them to us. We did not have to micromanage anything, the tasks were presented on time, and problems were addressed in advance. It scaled several Web3 launches on our behalf considerably easier.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their consistency and the fact that they can be performed quietly at the background. They know the limitations of marketing and technical, uncommon with the project related to Web3.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: Nothing significant. There has been a seamless flow of the collaboration and we are pleased with the alliance.

labeled_fields.Brief description of your project: Our collaboration with Komanda was in the role of white-label web team, to offer marketing sites and front-end development to our blockchain and Web3 client projects.

reviews.title: High-Performance Centralized Cryptocurrency Exchange (CEX) Development.
reviews.profile_image_alt: Alexander Ruban, CEO at Testerly
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text:
Our experience with Peiko was defined by their remarkable engineering excellence and ability to deliver a high-performance system within a predictable timeframe. The project was managed with high professional rigor, using a structured Agile approach that provided regular updates on technical milestones.
The technical outcomes were impressive: the system successfully passed all stress tests, maintaining sub-millisecond latency under a target load of 100k TPS. This stability allowed us to secure partnerships with three major liquidity providers during the pre-launch phase. The team of 6-10 experts showed a high level of ownership, ensuring all critical components—including the matching engine and wallet integrations—were delivered exactly on schedule. Their proactive communication and ability to address technical challenges during the integration phase resulted in a production-ready core that is both scalable and highly resilient.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: What impressed us most was Peiko's remarkable engineering excellence, specifically their ability to deliver a high-performance system that met all technical objectives within a predictable timeframe. The system successfully maintained sub-millisecond latency under a target load of 100k TPS during stress tests, proving the platform's stability and resilience. Their proactive communication and structured Agile approach made the integration phase smooth and efficient.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: It is rare to encounter a development cycle where every technical objective is met so precisely, leaving no suggestions for improvement. The project was managed with high professional rigor from the initial architecture design to the final stress testing. Because the team delivered a production-ready engine that exceeded our performance benchmarks while staying exactly on schedule, we are exceptionally satisfied with the results and found no areas of concern.

labeled_fields.Brief description of your project: The project involved the full-cycle development of a professional-grade centralized cryptocurrency exchange (CEX) designed for extreme throughput. The primary objective was to build a custom matching engine capable of handling over 100,000 transactions per second to compete with top-tier global platforms. The scope of work included low-latency execution systems, a secure order book management system, integration of hot and cold wallet clusters, a comprehensive admin panel for risk management, and a robust API for institutional liquidity providers. Additionally, advanced security layers were implemented to prevent front-running and ensure data integrity.

reviews.title: AMAP Infotech delivered scalable software that improved our operational efficiency.
reviews.reviewer_role: Sales Manager at Astro Machine Works
reviews.profile_image_alt: Brian Hess, Sales Manager at Astro Machine Works
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text:
Our experience with AMAP Infotech was highly professional and structured. From the discovery phase, their team focused on understanding our workflows, bottlenecks, and long-term business objectives before proposing a technical solution. Their analytical approach ensured that the final system addressed root operational challenges rather than surface-level issues.
Throughout development, communication was consistent and transparent. Milestones were clearly defined, timelines were respected, and feedback loops were efficiently managed. The team demonstrated strong expertise in backend architecture, database optimization, and secure system design.
Since implementation, we have seen measurable improvements in workflow automation, reporting accuracy, and cross-department coordination. Manual errors have decreased, processing time has improved, and management now has access to real-time insights for better decision-making.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their structured development process, strong technical foundation, and ability to translate complex business requirements into a clean, scalable software solution.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: Initial documentation during early testing phases could have been more detailed, but they quickly improved clarity once the feedback was provided.

labeled_fields.Project title: Custom Enterprise Software Development & System Automation
labeled_fields.Brief description of your project:
We partnered with AMAP Infotech to design and develop a custom enterprise software solution to streamline our internal workflows and improve operational efficiency. Our organization required a centralized system capable of managing multiple business processes, automating repetitive tasks, and improving data visibility across departments.
AMAP Infotech developed a scalable software platform tailored to our operational model. The solution included custom modules for process management, reporting dashboards, role-based access control, and system integrations with our existing tools. The architecture was designed for flexibility and long-term scalability, allowing us to expand functionality as our business grows.
The final product delivered improved process automation, better data accuracy, and enhanced collaboration across teams.

reviews.title: My experience with Funkymedia was highly professional and results-driven, with innovative AI-powered
reviews.profile_image_alt: Trevor noon, Chief Technology Officer at Exusia
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text: My overall experience with Funkymedia was extremely positive and exceeded expectations. From the very beginning, the team demonstrated a strong understanding of both digital marketing fundamentals and advanced AI-driven solutions. Their strategic approach was clearly data-oriented, focusing on measurable performance improvements rather than just surface-level metrics.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: What I liked most about Funkymedia was their innovative use of AI combined with a highly professional and strategic approach. They didn’t rely on generic marketing tactics—instead, they used data-driven insights, automation, and predictive analytics to create tailored solutions that delivered measurable results.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: Regarding Funkymedia, there wasn’t anything major to criticize; however, at times the detailed analytics reports and technical explanations (especially around AI tools and data modeling) could feel quite complex for someone without a strong technical background.

labeled_fields.Brief description of your project: The project focused on implementing AI-driven digital marketing solutions to enhance online visibility, optimize customer acquisition, and improve overall campaign performance. Funkymedia developed a comprehensive strategy combining Artificial Intelligence tools with advanced SEO, content marketing, and performance analytics.

reviews.title: Professional, efficient, and their AI solution improved our online customer support workflow.
reviews.reviewer_meta_text: Reviewed on 1/1/70 by Juan Pablo Garrido Marguery
reviews.reviewer_role: Chief Financial Officer at Felt Bicycles
reviews.profile_image_alt: Juan Pablo Garrido Marguery, Chief Financial Officer at Felt Bicycles
reviews.posting_preference: Display both my name and the company's name with the review
reviews.review_text:
Our experience with Agix Technology was very positive. They clearly understood our e‑commerce operations and customer service challenges. The team communicated effectively and implemented the AI system with minimal disruption to our daily operations.
After deployment, routine inquiries and support requests were handled much faster, reducing workload for our staff and improving customer satisfaction. The system was easy to use, and Agix provided prompt support whenever needed. Overall, the project delivered tangible improvements to our customer support efficiency.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their practical approach and focus on results. The AI system was easy to use and genuinely reduced our team’s workload while improving response times.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: There were no significant issues. The only minor point was the initial monitoring period, where some adjustments were needed to optimize responses, but Agix guided us through it efficiently.

labeled_fields.Project title: AI-Powered Customer Support Automation for E‑Commerce
labeled_fields.Brief description of your project:
We partnered with Agix Technology to improve how our online store handles customer inquiries, FAQs, and return requests. With high daily volumes of emails and messages, our team was spending too much time on routine support tasks.
Agix implemented an AI-powered solution that could respond to common questions, guide customers through returns, and provide accurate information quickly. This allowed our support staff to focus on more complex customer needs and improved response times across our e‑commerce channels.

reviews.title: Reliable team and a useful AI system that improved our internal support efficiency.

reviews.posting_preference: Only display my name with the review
reviews.review_text: Their team was organized and easy to communicate with, and they clearly explained each step of the implementation. They focused on understanding our operational needs rather than offering a generic solution.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their responsiveness and practical approach. They concentrated on delivering a solution that our staff could actually use daily instead of something overly complex.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: There were no major concerns. The only minor issue was the initial configuration stage took a little longer than expected, but it ensured the system was properly tailored to our processes.

labeled_fields.Project title: AI Support Automation and Knowledge Assistant Implementation
labeled_fields.Brief description of your project:
We engaged Agix Technology to help us improve how our team handles internal support requests and technical information sharing. Our staff often needed to search across multiple sources for documentation, procedures, and previous cases, which was time-consuming and inconsistent.
Agix proposed an AI-based solution that could centralize knowledge and allow team members to quickly retrieve relevant information. The system analyzes internal documents and support materials and provides structured answers, helping our staff respond faster and work more efficiently.

reviews.review_text: Their team took the time to understand how our university handles large volumes of administrative documents and routine tasks. Communication was clear and timely, and the implementation process fit smoothly into our daily operations.

question_answers.question: What is it about the company that you appreciate the most?
question_answers.answer: Their ability to tailor a practical AI solution to our specific administrative challenges stood out. They focused on solutions that genuinely improved our workflow and delivered meaningful results.

question_answers.question: What was it about the company that you didn't like which they should do better?
question_answers.answer: There were no major issues. The only small challenge was a short period of adjustment for our team to learn the new tools, but Agix provided clear guidance which made it easy.

labeled_fields.Project title: AI-Powered Administrative Workflow Automation for University
labeled_fields.Brief description of your project:
We worked with Agix Technology to automate repetitive administrative tasks related to document handling, student record processing, and internal reporting workflows. The goal was to reduce manual effort on routine tasks to allow our team to focus more on strategic educational activities.
Agix assessed our existing processes and deployed an AI solution that could extract, structure, and organize relevant information from various documents, making it easier for our administrative staff to access needed data quickly.
